page.title: 04LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: THERE ARE NOT ANY LARGE SPORTS CENTRES OR OTHER LARGE LEISURE CENTRES IN THE AREA.HOWEVER THERE ARE MANY FORMS OF SMALLER ACTIVITIES WHICH THE LOCAL PEOPLE USE REGULARLY.THESE BEING {1)FOOTBALL(in the local leagues) {2)TENNIS(on the local park) {3)BOWLS(mainly for the older folk) {4)TABLE TENNIS(in the sports {pavillion) { 5)YOUTH CLUB(in the old junior {school) { 6)BINGO(in the sports pavillion) { 7)CRICKET CLUB (in local leagues) { 8)SNOOKER CLUB (in the club room) { 9)DARTS(pub teams in the local {leagues) { 10)SCOUTS,CUBS,GUIDES and {BROWNIES.(in the scout hut.)
